project.name: athena
project.description: A knowledge base system using Qdrant vector database and text embedding to enable agentic code tools to work with markdown and PDF files

features.name: Document Ingestion - Markdown

description.purpose: Parse and process markdown (.md) files from a specified directory, extracting text content while preserving structure for meaningful chunking.
acceptance_criteria: Recursively scan directories for .md files
Parse markdown syntax and extract plain text content
Preserve document structure (headings, sections) for context
Split documents into appropriately-sized chunks for embedding
Track source file path and chunk position metadata

notes: Initial feature proposal for markdown document processing

features.name: Document Ingestion - PDF

description.purpose: Parse and process PDF files, extracting text content for embedding and semantic search.
acceptance_criteria: Recursively scan directories for .pdf files
Extract text content from PDF pages
Handle multi-page documents appropriately
Split extracted text into chunks suitable for embedding
Track source file path, page number, and chunk position metadata

notes: Initial feature proposal for PDF document processing
Consider using pdf-extract or similar crate
May need to handle different PDF encodings

features.name: Text Embedding Integration

description.purpose: Convert text chunks into vector embeddings using an embedding API service for semantic similarity search.
acceptance_criteria: Support configurable embedding API endpoint
Handle API authentication via environment variables
Convert text chunks to vector embeddings
Support batch embedding for efficiency
Handle rate limiting and retries gracefully
Return embedding vectors with consistent dimensions

notes: Embedding service should be pluggable (OpenAI, local models, etc.)
Consider caching embeddings to avoid redundant API calls

features.name: Qdrant Vector Storage

description.purpose: Store and manage document embeddings in Qdrant vector database for efficient similarity search.
acceptance_criteria: Connect to Qdrant instance (local or cloud)
Create and manage collections for document embeddings
Store vectors with associated metadata (source, chunk info)
Support upsert operations for updating existing documents
Handle connection errors and reconnection gracefully

notes: Collection schema should support filtering by source file

features.name: Semantic Search Query Interface

description.purpose: Provide a search interface that takes natural language queries, converts them to embeddings, and retrieves semantically similar document chunks from Qdrant.
acceptance_criteria: Accept natural language query input
Convert query to embedding using same embedding service
Search Qdrant for similar vectors
Return ranked results with relevance scores
Include source metadata (file path, chunk context) in results
Support configurable result count and similarity threshold

notes: Core functionality for AI tool integration
Results should include enough context to be useful

features.name: CLI Interface

description.purpose: Provide a command-line interface for indexing documents and querying the knowledge base.
acceptance_criteria: index command: Index documents from a specified directory
search command: Query the knowledge base with natural language
status command: Show indexing status and statistics
Support configuration via command-line flags and environment variables
Provide helpful error messages and usage information

notes: Consider using clap for argument parsing
CLI should be usable standalone or integrated with AI tools
